thread.title: BRIEF-Spire Reports Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $2.39

title: BRIEF-Spire Reports Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $2.39
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Spire Inc:
* SPIRE REPORTS FIRST QUARTER RESULTS * Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.39 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.07 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FOR QUARTER, NON-CASH IMPACTS IN RESULTS FROM OPERATIONS WERE A DECREASE TO INCOME TAX EXPENSE OF $59.9 MILLION
* CAPITAL EXPENDITURES FORECAST FOR FISCAL 2018 IS APPROXIMATELY $490 MILLION
* FIVE-YEAR CAPITAL SPEND OUTLOOK FOR FISCAL YEARS 2017-2021 REMAINS APPROXIMATELY $2.3 BILLION
* QTRLY TOTAL OPERATING REVENUES $561.8 MILLION VERSUS $495.1 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
